entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
